dublinCore.dc:title: HR 5816 ENR: To extend the authorization for the United States Commission on International Religious Freedom.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To extend the authorization for the United States Commission on International Religious Freedom.

section.text: The International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 207(a) (22 U.S.C. 6435(a)), by striking 2014 and inserting 2015; and
in section 209 (22 U.S.C. 6436), by striking September 30, 2014 and inserting September 30, 2015.

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall take effect as if enacted on December 10, 2014.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
